doc.title: Escamotage
doc.plot: On a beautiful South Pacific island, crime washed the innocence from this once tranquil gem. A forgotten tourist destination, no one is safe on this lawless rock. One man, buried deep in its criminal underworld sees the light through the woman of his dreams. In a bid to leave the island together and start a new life, they secretly meet to plan their future. Those dreams are quickly shattered when the cities' Kingpin is informed of his daughters escapades. Now a marked man, he must put their escape plan into action and make it out in one piece.
